global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line 2020-03-02T09:59:39 UTC and recovered 2020-05-22T17:43:33 UTC. The DVL was disabled on 2020-04-17, the optode on 2020-05-04 and the remaining sensors on 2020-05-08 to conserve battery power. The glider was restricted to deeper water on the southern portion of the FZ line (SW to SE) after 2020-05-04 to limit pump inflections. This was a relatively normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_514
